title: Old Friends Gold: Where Are the ‘RuPaul’s Drag Race’ Winners Now?
summary: The Hollywood Reporter caught up with a batch of crowned queens from the original series so they could reflect on what it's really like to win the reality series, what life-changing opportunities they've taken part in since the show and where their careers are headed next.

title: U.S. LNG Exports Break 100 Million Tons in Record 2025
summary: U.S. liquefied natural gas exports set new records in 2025 as new capacity came online and existing terminals ran at high utilization, pushing annual shipments past levels previously thought years away. Preliminary data from LSEG show the United States exported 111 million metric tons of LNG last y…

title: Búzios Keeps Climbing as Petrobras Adds 180,000 Bpd With P-78 FPSO
summary: Petrobras has brought the P-78 FPSO online at its Búzios 6 development, adding up to 180,000 barrels per day of oil capacity and reinforcing just how central the pre-salt has become to Brazil’s production story. The new unit is the seventh FPSO now operating at the Búzios field in the Santos Basin,…

title: US Oil Drilling Activity Ends Down for 2025, But Production Still Near Highs
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States rose by 1 this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published earlier this week, bringing the total rig count in the US to 546 this week, down 43 from this same time last year. title: How Energy Scarcity Is Reshaping the Global Economy
summary: Recently, many people have begun talking about the US having a k-shaped economy. In it, a handful of wealthy people are doing very well financially, while many others are falling further and further behind. I expect that the low wages of the majority of workers will soon lead to adverse impacts on …

title: Crackdown on crypto tax evasion comes into force
summary: UK among a first wave of countries to collect digital currency transaction records and share information

title: Central banks enter the gold trade to choke off smuggling
summary: More countries are buying directly from artisanal miners as trafficking robs them of tax revenues and foreign exchange

title: US sanctions four traders it says are shipping Venezuelan oil
summary: Decision marks Washington’s latest move to increase pressure on Maduro regime in Caracas

title: Trump media group plans new token with Crypto.com
summary: TMTG shares jump on news company will hand shareholders a new cryptocurrency with unnamed perks

title: Syria removes Assad family from banknotes in currency relaunch
summary: Central bank will cut two zeros from Syrian pound and replace images of ousted dictator with olives, roses and mulberries
